content.body: can we change the default branch from `master` -> `main` ?
content.formatted_body: can we change the default branch from master -> main ?

content.body: * asking for consensus to change the default branch from `master` -> `main`
content.formatted_body: * asking for consensus to change the default branch from master -> main

m.new_content.body: asking for consensus to change the default branch from `master` -> `main`

content.body: do it, but first be very careful to note how many PRs (if any) *won't* be retargeted - those will be permanently unrecoverable unless the author checks the "allow edits" box before the switch.
content.formatted_body: do it, but first be very careful to note how many PRs (if any) won't be retargeted - those will be permanently unrecoverable unless the author checks the "allow edits" box before the switch.

content.body: just checked -- all allow edits to maintainers.. the only ones that don't are branches on the repo, not forks, where that doesn't apply
